main event: An airline pilot sighted a round, white-tan object that changed color and shape over a period of 11 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially pink, then changed to bluish-white.
The object's shape changed from round to elliptical.
After 7 minutes, the object changed course, picked up speed, and disappeared.
A Navy aircraft flying in the area did not sight the object.
The object was compared in size to a quarter held at arm's length.
sighted object: round, white-tan object that changed color and shape
